introShort: Short help for daily life. Tap a topic to get quick, clear steps.

school.title: School & Education
school.subtitle: Enroll kids, paperwork, contact school
school.tip: To register your child, bring ID and residence papers. Ask the school for an interpreter.

kids.title: Kids & Childcare
kids.subtitle: Daycare, playgroups, child benefits
kids.tip: Try the local parent-and-child groups. They often help with registration.

women.title: Support for Women
women.subtitle: Health, safety and support services
women.tip: If you need help, contact local women's shelters and health centers listed on Contacts.

sim.title: SIM Cards & Phones
sim.subtitle: Where to buy, prepaid, balance tips
sim.tip: Buy a prepaid SIM at supermarkets or kiosks; bring your ID.

recycling.title: Recycling & Waste
recycling.subtitle: How to sort waste in Austria
recycling.tip: Sort paper, plastic, glass, organic waste in separate bins.

transport.title: Public Transport
transport.subtitle: Tickets, short-term passes, how to ride
transport.tip: Buy a single ticket before boarding or use the official mobile app.

culture.title: Culture & Events
culture.subtitle: Free events, museums, community groups
culture.tip: Search local NGO calendars for free community events.

sport.title: Sport & Clubs
sport.subtitle: How to join local sports groups
sport.tip: Many sports clubs offer trial sessionsâ€”ask about low-cost memberships.

political.title: Civic & Political Education
political.subtitle: Voting rules, rights, participation
political.tip: Non-citizens can join community consultations; learn the basics at local civic centers.

climate.title: Climate & Environment
climate.subtitle: Local climate habits and safety tips
climate.tip: Prepare for winter: wear layers and check local weather advisories.
